job_description:
Company: CloudNative
Position: Software Engineer (Backend)
Location: Austin, TX (Remote)
Salary: $100,000 - $130,000

About Us:
CloudNative specializes in building scalable and reliable cloud-native applications. We are committed to delivering high-quality software solutions. We only work in containerized and serverless environments.

Job Description:
We are looking for a Backend Software Engineer to develop and maintain our server-side applications. The ideal candidate will have experience with Node.js, databases, and cloud technologies.

Responsibilities:
- Design, develop, and test backend APIs using Node.js and Express.js.
- Implement database schemas and optimize queries.
- Deploy and maintain applications on cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP).
- Participate in code reviews and contribute to our development standards.

Requirements:
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field.
- 2+ years of experience in backend development.
- Proficiency in Node.js, JavaScript, and SQL.
- Experience with RESTful APIs.

Preferred Qualifications:
- Experience with serverless technologies (e.g., Lambda, Azure Functions).
- Knowledge of containerization technologies (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes).
- Familiarity with testing frameworks (e.g., Jest, Mocha).

Benefits:
- Competitive salary and benefits package.
- Opportunity to work on cutting edge cloud technologies.
- Remote work environment.
- Professional development opportunities.
